thread.title: Learn to "Calm the Chaos" with Kelly White's New Book
thread.title_full: Learn to "Calm the Chaos" with Kelly White's New Book

title: Learn to "Calm the Chaos" with Kelly White's New Book
text:
"Calm the Chaos" with Kelly Whites New Book – 
Calm the Chaos: From Surviving to Thriving in 28 Days . Kelly White is more than an author; she is also a successful entrepreneur. Her goal is to help as many people benefit from the healing effects of yoga. This book will also have information useful to everyone, especially those facing the challenge of constant anxiety and stress. If this applies, then this book is essential. 
creating a guide on yoga and what she hoped to accomplish with it, Kelly White, author and entrepreneur, said: It is my story of struggling through divorce, depression, anorexia and addiction to adrenaline. It is a story, and a process, about completing a 28-day journey that I designed to help to heal myself by reducing stress and anxiety. The journey consists of practicing yoga, meditation, reflection through journaling and focus on a healthy lifestyle every day for 28 days" 
getkelly.com 
http://photos.webwire.com/prmedia/40662/200497/200497-1.jpg )
